# Func Stash
 A package that adds useful functions to Python.

# Functions

Increment variable:
```
inc(x)
```
Decrement variable:
```
dec(x)
```
Convert a list of strings to integers (only works with string numbers)
```
convertToInt(list)
```

Convert a list of integers to strings
```
convertToStr(list)
```

Convert a list to boolean values
```
convertToBool(list)
```
